Html: I loaded my current feral druid in tanking gear into 2.1 to take a look at it.  Many of the listed upgrades are caster gear with a lot of stamina.  Any way to filter those out?

The best thing to do is to delete Data/ItemCache.xml and Data/ItemSource.xml whenever you get a new version.  Also keeping a separate Rawr directory for each character helps too.  That way stray items don't clutter up your database.

This didn't exactly get me where I wanted to go unfortunately.

I did as described, then tried to load upgrades from armory.  However, since I am only 71 right now, armory does not return any gear beyond lvl 71.
If I try the load gear from wotlk wowhead option, I am back in the same boat with spell power gear.

Thanks for the idea though.
